name: コイカツ！ / Koikatsu Party VR
detailed_description:
Hold on to your headsets, VR fans, for you're about to get a free DLC that'll blow your mind (among other things)!

Following right on the heels of Koikatsu Party is its first free DLC, Koikatsu Party VR! That's right, prepare your body for an immersive and hands-on VR experience the likes of which have never been seen before!

Brought to you by the mavens at Illusion, this interactive sex experience lets you rub, rub, rub your waifu, gently till she moans. And of course, it's not all about caressing! You can fiddle around with foreplay, or leap straight out of your shorts and into the endgame. Whatever your predilection, make sure to grab Koikatsu Party VR and experience the pleasure!

short_description: Hold on to your headsets, VR fans, for you're about to get a free DLC that'll blow your mind (among other things)! This interactive sex experience lets you rub, rub, rub your waifu, gently till she moans! Give it a try...it's free!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7 / 8.1 / 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 or GTX 1060 or better / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content
